Original: 這家酒肆西門真是絕佳的品酒勝地！這裡的酒類豐富多樣，能滿足不同口味的需求。更值得一提的是，酒肆內的人文氣息濃厚，讓人感受到濃烈的文化底蘊。無論是與好友聚會還是獨自品味，都能在這裡度過一段美好的時光。強烈推薦！
EN: This wine restaurant Ximen is really a great wine tasting!The alcohol here is rich and diverse, which can meet the needs of different flavors.What's more worth mentioning is that the humanistic atmosphere in the wine shop is strong, which makes people feel a strong cultural heritage.Whether it is a party with friends or taste alone, you can spend a good time here.Recommended strongly!
